effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon transforms into a random opponent upon entering battle. This effect is identical to the move transform.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.
